member.name: T:Restless.ParameterType
member.summary: Parameter type enum. Query, FormUrlEncoded or Url.

member.name: F:Restless.ParameterType.Query
member.summary: Parameter is added to the URL as query parameter (?name=value).

member.name: F:Restless.ParameterType.FormUrlEncoded
member.summary: Parameter is added to a POST request with FormUrlEncoded Http content.

member.name: F:Restless.ParameterType.Url
member.summary: Parameter is used to format the URL string (replaces a {name}).

member.name: T:Restless.BaseRestRequest
member.summary: Base class for a RestRequest based on HttpWebRequest. Protected methods are commented in RestRequest. If a custom RestRequest is needed, then subclass BaseRestRequest. Make a public "new" method that delegates to the BaseRestRequest protected method if some base methods are needed. Otherwise the new class has a "clean" interface, and only higher level methods are exposed public. See RestRequest.
member.remarks: Currently the BaseRestRequest does not verify that the underlying HttpRequestMessage.Content is set correctly. The developer is responsible for setting a correct HttpContent. For example a POST request should use FormUrlEncoded content when parameters are needed...

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.content_handler
member.summary: Content (de)serialization handler.

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.query_params
member.summary: Url query parameters: ?name=value

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.param
member.summary: When method is GET then added as query parameters too. Otherwise added as FormUrlEncoded parameters: name=value

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.url_params
member.summary: Url parameters ../{name}.

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.url
member.summary: The url string. Can contain {name} and/or format strings {0}.

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.urlFormatParams
member.summary: Last url format {} set with UrlFormat.

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.cancellation
member.summary: A CancellationToken that is used in buildAndSendRequest (client.sendAsync(.., cancellation)).

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.client
member.summary: HttpClient used to send the request message.

member.name: F:Restless.BaseRestRequest.request
member.summary: Internal request message.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The initial request message, or null if not used.
The initial http client, or null if not used.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Get
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to GET.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Head
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to HEAD.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Post
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to POST.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Put
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to PUT.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Delete
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to DELETE.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Trace
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to TRACE.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Connect
member.summary: Set the HttpMethod to CONNECT.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddContent(System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a HttpContent to the Request. Multiple contents can be set. For example first a MultipartContent can be added with AddMultipart(..). Then a StreamContent can be added to this MultipartContent with AddStream(..). If the underlying request.Content is a MultipartContent or MultipartFormDataContent -> the content is added to this MultipartContent. Otherwise the request.Content is simply set to the given content.
member.param: The HttpContent.
A name can be needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.
A file name can be needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.ClearContent
member.summary: Sets the underlying HttpContent to null.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddByteArray(System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a ByteArrayContent to the request.
member.param: The buffer containing data.
A name is needed if underlying HttpContent is MultipartFormDataContent. (for example multiple file uploads)
A file name is needed if underlying HttpContent is MultipartFormDataContent.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddFormUrl(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds a FormUrlEncodedContent to the request. If kvPairs are given and kvPairs.Length % 2 is even and length is not zero the kvPairs array is treated as a key value pair list. These key-value pairs are added to the FormUrlEncodedContent on construction. If no kvPairs are given all parameters added with Param(..) are added to the new FromUrlEncodedContent.
member.param: The list of key-value pairs. Must contain an even number of string objects if used.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddMultipart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a MultipartContent to the request.
member.param: The sub type if needed.
The boundary if needed.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddMultipartForm(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a MultipartFormDataContent to the request.
member.param: The boundary if needed.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddStream(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StreamContent to the request.
member.param: The stream to be added.
The media type of the stream.
The buffer size used to process the stream. Default is 1024.
A name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.
A file name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddString(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StringContent to the request.
member.param: The string content.
The content encoding.
The content media type.
A name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.
A file name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddJson(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object as serialized json string.
member.remarks: Throws exception if the given object is null, or if the serialized json string is null or empty.
member.param: The object that will be serialized and added as json string content.
A name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.
A file name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.AddXml(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an object as serialized xml string.
member.remarks: Throws exception if the given object is null, or if the serialized xml string is null or empty.
member.param: The object that will be serialized and added as xml string content.
A name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.
A file name needed when content is a MultipartFormDataContent already.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.CancelToken(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Set the CancellationToken for this request.
member.param: The token.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Url(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the URL string for this request.
member.param: The URL string.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.UrlFormat(System.Object[])
member.summary: Sets the URL format parameter for this request. A test String.Format is done to verify the input objects.
member.param: The format parameter objects.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.RequestAction(System.Action{System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage})
member.param: An action that takes a HttpRequestMessage as argument.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.ClientAction(System.Action{System.Net.Http.HttpClient})
member.param: An action that takes a HttpClient as argument.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Basic(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a Http Basic authorization header to the request. The result string is Base64 encoded internally.
member.param: The user name.
The user password.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Bearer(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a Http Bearer authorization header to the request. The given token string is Base64 encoded internally.
member.param: The token string.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Param(System.String,System.Object,Restless.ParameterType)
member.summary: Adds a parameter to the request. Can be a Query, FormUrlEncoded or Url parameter. If a value for the given name is already set, the old parameter value is overwritten silently.
member.param: The parameter name.
The parameter value (should be convertible to string).
The ParameterType.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.UrlParam(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an url parameter to the request. Url parameters are part of the set url string of the form {name}. The {name} is replaced by the given value before the request is sent. If an url parameter value for the given name already exists the old value is overwritten silently.
member.param: The parameter name.
The parameter value (should be convertible to string).

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.QParam(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a query parameter (?name=value) to the request. The parameter-value pair is added to the URL before sending the request.
member.param: The parameter name.
The parameter value (should be convertible to string).

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Header(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a header with a single value to the request.
member.param: The header name.
The header value (should be convertible to string).

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Header(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a header with multiple values to the request.
member.param: The header name.
The header values (should be convertible to string).

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.GetResponseAsync
member.summary: Sends the request and return the raw HttpResponseMessage.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.GetRestResponseAsync(System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{Restless.IVoid}},System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{Restless.IVoid}})
member.summary: Sends the request and returns a RestResponse with generic type IVoid.
member.param: Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A Task containing the RestRespone. There will be no deserialized data, but the RestResponse.Response (HttpResponseMessage) will be set.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.Fetch``1(System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}},System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}})
member.summary: Sends the request and returns the RestResponse containing deserialized data from the HttpResponseMessage.Content if T is not IVoid.
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A taks containing the RestResponse with the deserialized data if T is not IVoid and no error occured.

member.summary: Uploads a binary file using StreamContent. The file is opened by this function.
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: The path to the file that will be uploaded.
The file content type.
Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A taks containing the RestResponse with the deserialized data if T is not IVoid and no error occured.

member.summary: Uploads a binary (file) stream using StreamContent.
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: The (file) stream that will be uploaded.
The file content type.
Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.UploadFileFormData``1(System.String,System.String,System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}},System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}})
member.summary: Uploads a binary file using a MultipartFormDataContent and a (sub) StreamContent. AddFormUrl() is called before the StreamContent is added to the MultipartFormDataContent. AddFormUrl() will add all parameter to the request that are added with Param(..). The file is opened by this function.
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: The path to the file that will be uploaded.
The file content type.
Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A taks containing the RestResponse with the deserialized data if T is not IVoid and no error occured.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.UploadFileFormData``1(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}},System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}})
member.summary: Uploads a binary (file) stream using a MultipartFormDataContent and a (sub) StreamContent. AddFormUrl() is called before the StreamContent is added to the MultipartFormDataContent. AddFormUrl() will add all parameter to the request that are added with Param(..).
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: The (file) stream that will be uploaded.
The file content type.
The "path" of the (file) stream that will be uploaded.
Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A taks containing the RestResponse with the deserialized data if T is not IVoid and no error occured.

member.name: M:Restless.BaseRestRequest.buildAndSendRequest``1(System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}},System.Action{Restless.RestResponse{``0}})
member.summary: A helper function that is doing all the "hard" work setting up the request and sending it. 1) The Url is formated using String.Format if UrlParamÂ´s where added. 2) The query parameter are added to the URL with RestlessExtensions.CreateRequestUri 3) The request is send. 4) The RestResponse is set.
member.typeparam: The type of the deserialized data. Set to IVoid if no deserialization is wanted.
member.param: Action that is called on success. (No exceptions and HttpStatus code is ok).
Action that is called when an error occures. (Exceptions or HttpStatus code not ok).
member.returns: A taks containing the RestResponse with the deserialized data if T is not IVoid and no error occured.

member.summary: Check if param contains a value for the given name already
member.param: The parameter name.
member.returns: True if already containing value for given name, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Restless.RestResponse`1
member.summary: A class representing a REST response message. It contains the raw HttpResponseMessage returned from the request. Further it contains the deserialized data if no exception occured, T != IVoid and the response status code matches.
member.typeparam: The type of the data that will be deserialized.
